h2_title: Red Boy Boss Fight and Guide
content: You can approach the second part of the fight in much the same way you did the first, and if you haven't used too many spells, now is the time to unleash them and get the rest of his health down as soon as possible.
promot:
This is an excerpt from the file 'Red_Boy.md', within the main section titled 'Red Boy', specifically from the subsection 'Red Boy Boss Fight and Guide'.
The content is as follows:
You can approach the second part of the fight in much the same way you did the first, and if you haven't used too many spells, now is the time to unleash them and get the rest of his health down as soon as possible.
